docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 28 -- Argentina reaffirmed today her support of the principle of non-intervention, or "hands off," in relation to Premier Fidel Castro's Cuba.

docs.snippet: The Wall in Berlin, mushroom clouds over the Arctic, blue helmets of U.N. troops in the Congo, the banners of "anti-colonialism" -- these were among the significant symbols of 1961. They stood for the struggle between East and West, and for the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Wall in Berlin, mushroom clouds over the Arctic, blue helmets of U.N. troops in the Congo, the banners of "anti-colonialism" -- these were among the significant symbols of 1961. They stood for the struggle between East and West, and for the immense pressures welling up in the underdeveloped world.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 30 -- Diplomatic consultations on the conference on Cuba to be held by the Inter-American foreign ministers appeared today to be evolving toward a compromise.
